comments.comment:
Hi yaluvane  suba  davasak.  ,
Api  hamoma  methumava  araksha  karaganna  one.  Methumanlata uparima  gauravaya  diya  uthui.  Obala  dannava  athi  budu  varayekugei  pase buduvarayekugei  thiyena  venasa.  Buduvarayata  thaman danna  siyalu  de  ithama  phadiliva  minisunta  avaboda  kara  denna  puluvan.  Habai  pase  budu varayath  a danum  sambaraya  a vidiyatama  thibbath  pahadiliva  avaboda  kara  dimata  nohakii. Budun vahanse  asama  samani  mama kiyanna  uthsaha  Kare  methumath ithama  buddimath  miniseki . Methuma  tharam  me  anathuru  mulinma  daka  ithama  hodin  pahadili  kara  venath  kisidu  manthri  varayek  nomatha.  Mama  kiyanne  borunam  2015 sita  ha pasu  me yaha  palanaya  enna  kalin  idan  ada  dakkvama  methumage  kathavan  madakata  balanna  . Eva  notherima  jathiye  avasanavaya.  ...

All Srilankans Wake Up now.
Wahama mulu lankawema vurthikayin work to rule  patan ganna, siyaluma janaya parata bahinna  pagamanin Maha Sanghaya ha Cardinal thumanla ha anik poojaka waru mulikathwayen wahama me siyaluma givisum , kontraththu nawathwana lesa me rajayata protest kara araliyagaha wata raswenna, janapath gedara wada raswenna, me givisum ira damanathuru.

comments.comment:
Katha nam kata barida???????

225 ma adu wadiyen rata arajika karata waga kiwa yuthui....

Desapalanikawa, arthikawa, jathika arakshawa,
Me hama patthenma arajikai...

Mun 225 denama thamai waga kiyanna ona,

Anika mun ekathu wela hadan inna pimpi viwasthawa hadagena sammatha karan inne...

Minissunta wela thiyenne badhu gewala mun 225 denawa nadatthu karanna,

Kauda me hene ape oluwata path kare????
Pakayala 225 denage gedara inna ballo pawa yanne ape salli walin duwana wahana walin,

Thopi 225 dena mulinma karanna ona .......,,,,,,,,,,,
Aurudu 5 bale aran auwrudu 10 wada givisum gahana eka nawatthanna (videsha ratawal samaga) nithiya sammatha kala yuthui....

Anika rate viwasthawa jana mathayen sammatha kala yuthui...

Desapalana ponnayanta ona vidiyata viwasthawa wenas kirimata bari wena vidiyata jana mathayen sammatha kala yuthui...

Nikam buranne nathuwa oya tikawath karapalla
